name: functioning
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of working or operating, or the way that something operates: functioning of Extreme weather conditions are affecting the functioning of the railway service. Researchers studied how the vitamin supports the healthy functioning of cells.
the normal way that someone's body or mind works and their ability to do things: If sadness is getting in the way of your everyday functioning, you should see a doctor. The special needs assessment helps us to determine the child's current level of functioning and to set learning goals.
More examplesFewer examplesCertain rules are essential to the smooth functioning of the hospital.Across the world we are seeing a lot of instability in the political functioning of states.Restrictions impede the efficient functioning of the market, he claims.Bladder and bowel control are severely impaired and the patient needs constant assistance for daily functioning.
